GET IT NOW

La segunda entrega de la saga Portal, con una historia y jugabildad mucho más pulidas que la anterior (que ya es decir). También se nota la mejora en los gráficos, y la adición del modo cooperativo le da una vida más larga.

Es un juego que recomiendo a todo el mundo que haya jugado el primero, y si no lo has jugado, deberías.

Ever since the game came out, I've loved it. I had a great experiences playing the original Portal at a friend's place, and finally having my hands on my own Portal game, I have to say - I'm having a blast.

The more Ellen there is, the better the game is. Thankfully, there's plenty.
I am not a big fan of puzzle games. I saw portal and I thought it looked pretty good! Not a bad game. I just don't like most puzzle games.
Everything is awesome about this game

I shouldn't really have to tell you if this is good or not. Like seriously, it's made by valve, of course it's gonna be amazing. Anyway story is absolutely exceptional, the voice actors did an incredible job, and I was surprised to see JK Simmons make an appearance. In terms of gameplay, it's portal. It has the classic puzzling fun of the original game, plus a few extra gameplay concepts that are used well throughout the game, and make it feel just as fresh as it felt playing the original game for the first time. Exceptional, 10/10.

[h1]Awesome[/h1]
The game is fun, and the story is very clever. It was worth the entire $1.6 I paid for it. I recommend this game for anyone who has the money.
Spoiler part:
[spoiler]The ending is one of the best I've ever seen. I was actually just messing around because I thought that the ending was based on time, and I just shot the moon with my Portal Gun. That was [b]so[/b] clever. The final song "Want You Gone" also gave a wholesome to the two games.[/spoiler]
I've have finally thunken with the portals.

Great game. Even better than the first one, but play the first Portal before playiing the second for story context.

Le jeu a une bonne durée de vie, une difficulté modérée et un multiplayer sans aucune trace de lag. Je recommande vraiment pour ceux qui veulent se lancer dans les jeux de réfléxion sans trop se prendre la tête.
Bravo, Valve

ВСЕ ЧОТКО
这个游戏的世界观是真的庞大，它不仅仅是一个解密游戏，无意经过的计算机，墙上的涂鸦、壁纸，播放的录音都告诉你这个世界发生了什么，G姐的形象特别突出，变成马铃薯还那么毒舌，最后小机器人跳的舞很温馨。。3D眩晕者慎重，这个游戏的解密可以给九分，而故事可以独立出来一个3A大作游戏
A fantastic followup on the legendary debut game. It's challenging and looks a lot better than the first one.

[h1][b]Самая лучшая игра, в которую я когда либо играл!!! Здесь и сюжет и даже есть мультиплеер! Здесь просто всё идеально, особенно эффекты с порталами, которые проработаны до каждой мелочи. 

Вообщем - 10 обидных шуток от Глэдос из 10![b]

Had it in my library for years.  Just got around to playing it.  Thought Portal 1 was great, but 2 was awesome.  Both are timeless artworks.  Frikin' awesome.
Эта игра совместила в себе созидание и уничтожение. Постепенное разгадывание головоломок и экшн. Серьёзные прохождения с друзьями и фановые сессии. Это не игра - это легенда!

Secuela de una obra maestra atemporal como es su predecesor, no se queda atrás en nada. 

De hecho, es más largo, variado y repleto de revelaciones del anterior. Además cuenta con un cooperativo maravilloso.

9,5/10

Игра не чуть не хуже первой части напротив, вторая часть понравилась мне куда больше она также затягивает и также на многих уровнях есть пасхалки. в ней больше юмора, а также игра ответила на многие вопросы первой части например кто такая Гладос и что это вообще за комплекс. Финал отличный особенно песенка турелей мне понравилась.
10 поющих турелей из 10

The best, most entertaining puzzle game with loveable sarcastic characters and a unique storyline. dont forget to play co-op as well!

The other night I was bored and just wanted to get a decent Co-op game to play with my friend.
I heard that this game was a good time, but was still a little skeptical, due to it coming out so long ago.
In all the Co-op mode was some of the most fun I've ever had in a gaming experience. 
I don't even like to play sing player games, but I wanted to give it a try and it was great. 
All jokes hit and the gameplay was somewhat challenging 


10/10
